entry.title: [Xoxzo] Sponsoring PyCon in Kumamoto
entry.summary:
We Xoxzo proudly announce that we are sponsoring mini PyCon in Kumamoto 2017

Based on the experience we have joined series of PyCons within Asia Pacific region, such as Malaysia, Singapore and Taiwan.

Mini PyCon in Kumamoto 2017 is going to be held on April 23, 2017. This exact day is the first anniversary of tragic Kumamoto Earthquake of last year. PyCon Kumamoto committee is positively thinking to set the theme of this PyCon as MIRAI-Future with a hope of this PyCon to be the first step of Future Kumamoto PyCon Community.

This mini PyCon in Kumamoto 2017 expects about 100 attendance, including us Xoxzo as a Bronze Sponsor. Ian Lewis, a Google Developer Advocator will making the Keynote. There will be two 15 minutes talk by the students on top of standard eight 30 minute talks. The organizers have also prepared stipends for attendees coming from out of town.

Please see more details by visiting mini PyCon in Kumamoto 2017 website. We are looking forward to see you there in Kumamoto.

entry.title: Participating KOF-Kansai Open Source Forum
entry.summary:
We are happy to announce that our KOF (Kansai Open Forum held on Nov 11 & 12 in Osaka, Japan) display ended successful.

We had many visitor to our booth and were shown demonstration of ‘Sending SMS/Calls from the Internet’. Some immediately went thinking how to integrate the API into their own applications, while others tried to work out how this could work or just simply enjoy what our API does.

It was a great experience for us meeting our potential users, not only spreading our technology but also to know what further solutions they are seeking for, which would raise us to the next step, for further developments.

We are for sure to come back to the next exhibition to meet more people, with our aim to empower the world.
